Condition 1: In advanced AI knowledge, common regularization techniques used to prevent overfitting in machine learning models include L1 and L2 regularization, dropout, early stopping, and data augmentation.

As a general user, I would answer:

Condition 1 (Advanced knowledge level in AI): Common regularization techniques used to prevent overfitting in machine learning models include L1 and L2 regularization, dropout, early stopping, and data augmentation.

Condition 2 (Low knowledge level in AI): Common techniques to prevent overfitting in machine learning models are making sure the model doesn't memorize the training data too much by adding penalties for large weights or stopping training early.
